titleStmt.title: A Petitjon [sic] from the towne and county of Leicester unto the Kings most excellent Majesty. Also an other petition from the grand inquest of the same county unto his Majesty for the remouing of the magazine. : With his Majesties answer therewith. : Likewise certain propositions to his Majesty by Captain Grey and the Earl of Stamfords souldiers touching the magazin. : Also a declaration from the knights, esquires, gentlemen, grand iury-men, and free-holders, in the county of Leicester.
titleStmt.author: Grey, Captain.
Stamford, Henry Grey, Earl of, 1599?-1673.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for William Gay ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
